title: NOW OR NEVER - THE CALL TO RETURN

memory_verse.label: MEMORY VERSE
memory_verse.text: “Today, if you hear His voice, do not harden your hearts.” – Hebrews 3:15

devotion.label: INSIGHT / REFLECTION
devotion.text:
Today is not just another day, it’s God’s call for your repentance. He lovingly urges you to come close to Him for your safety. The enemy is roaring like a lion, ready to devour anyone who delays their surrender.

Are you still waiting, planning, or postponing your decision? Remember Felix, the Roman governor who trembled when Paul spoke about righteousness and judgment — yet said, “Go away for now; when I find a convenient time, I will call for you.” That convenient time never came.

The Bible warns:
“Now is the accepted time; now is the day of salvation.” – 2 Corinthians 6:2

Tomorrow is never guaranteed. Delay is the devil’s most effective trap. He has ages of experience in deceiving hearts. You may think you can escape later, but every delay draws you closer to danger.

God is waiting with open arms not to condemn, but to embrace. His mercy is still flowing; His grace still calling. When God speaks, don’t reason or hesitate simply say, “Yes, Lord.” That one word can change your eternity.

quote.label: TODAY'S QUOTE
quote.text: “The most dangerous word in the English language is ‘tomorrow.’” – D. L. Moody

prayer.label: PRAYER
prayer.text: Lord, help me not to delay when You call. Remove every distraction and fear that keeps me from surrender. Today, I repend and come to You fully and forever. Amen.

conclusion.label: CLOSING BLESSING
text: May your “Yes, Lord” today echo through eternity.
May His arms hold you before the enemy even reaches you.

recommended_book.title: THE PILGRIM’S PROGRESS
recommended_book.author: JOHN BUNYAN
recommended_book.quote: Christian leaves the City of Destruction crying, “Life! Life! Eternal life!” — the cry of true repentance
